name: TG FileShare Bot
description: BOT Multi Force Subs File Sharing Bot Is Useful For Saving Files And Can Be Accessed Via A Special Link

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Input Bot Token, Earn From t.me/BotFather

OWNER.description: Enter Telegram Username for Owner BOT [ Without @ ]

ADMINS.description: Enter User ID To Get Admin Rights In BOT [Use Space to Separate User ID]

APP_ID.description: Get APP ID On The Web my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Get API HASH On The Web my.telegram.org

PROTECT_CONTENT.description: To Prevent Bot Users From Downloading/forwarding/screenshot Of Content Sent In Bots [ If You Want To Enable Change To True ]

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: Enter The ID Of The Channel Or Group For Mandatory Subscription, If You Don't Want To Use The Fsub, Fill It With 0

FORCE_SUB_GROUP.description: Enter The ID Of The Group For Mandatory Subscription, if You Don't Want To Use The Fsub, Fill It With 0

START_MESSAGE.description: The Message /start Starts A Prefix To The Bot, Use Parsemode HTML Format
START_MESSAGE.value: Hello {first} I Can Save Private Files In Specific Channels And Other Users Can Access Them From

FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.description: Forced Message Subscribe Bot, Use Parsemode Format HTML
FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.value: Hello {first} You Have To Join My Channel/Group To Use Me Please Join The Channel First
